about_the_game:
This is the official soundtrack for Anarcute, including 22 tracks.

  • 1 - Anarcute Main Theme
  • 2 - Anarcute Menu Theme
  • 3 - Tokyo Theme
  • 4 - Brainwash Patrol Theme
  • 5 - Action Theme
  • 6 - Tokyo Boss
  • 7 - Paris Theme
  • 8 - Paris Theme Alternative
  • 9 - Paris Boss
  • 10 - Miami Theme
  • 11 - Miami Theme Alternative
  • 12 - Miami Boss
  • 13 - Miami Festival
  • 14 - Reykjavik Theme
  • 15 - Reykjavik Theme Alternative
  • 16 - Apocalypse Theme
  • 17 - Reykjavik Boss
  • 18 - Last City Theme
  • 19 - Last City Theme Alternative
  • 20 - Final Boss Theme
  • 21 - Final Boss Crazy Theme
  • 22 - The End

The Soundtrack will be placed in your Anarcute folder in the Steam Directory: …Steam\SteamApps\common\Anarcute[/i]
